divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and I went to Erwin park, she was walking the dogs and I was flying an rc electric airplane. The air was almost still only a few clouds in the sky. I had the plane in the air just about five min. As my plane came around to the east I could see a white sphere traveling from north to south. It lookded to be about 5,000.ft up. At an angle from me about 40 deg. It's size was about the size of a thumb tack head. The sphere looked like it was just north of McKinney. It was traveling at a steady clip fairly quickly across the sky. I circled the rc plane to keep it east of me so I could keep a watch on the sphere. I saw my wife comming at a distace I turned and called to her to look and I lost site of the white sphere. She didn't here me telling her to look. But when she found out what I was saying she took some pictures of the sky. I'm inclosing one of the pictures of what she took with the camera. I think it is just a jet plane and it's vapor trail. She seems to think it is more, I'll let you decide.
Summary: white sphere traveling north to south
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in McKinney
There was one other sighting in McKinney on or around May 2nd 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
